Text:
I was recently diagnosed with moderate to sever Dementia.  I remember long ago (I'm 63) when a father used this type of technique with his son who had "inoperable"  cancer.  I found a lot of personal healing through metaphysical and holistic approach.
Thank you sir for all of your superb work and thoughtfulness.
